FaqSection.title: Ask Question
FaqSection.subtitle: We aspire to meet your needs

faqs.question: Where can I benefit from Idarah's services?
faqs.answer: Available in all cities across the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

faqs.question: How can I benefit from Idarah's services?
faqs.answer: You can access our services through the contact numbers listed on Idarah's official website, then register and request your service.

faqs.question: How do you guarantee the accuracy of your real estate valuations?
faqs.answer:
We ensure accuracy through:
- Certified expert team (holding international certifications like RICS or IVSC)
- Advanced analysis tools (specialized software, real-time market data)
- Dual review process for every report before delivery
- Full compliance with international standards (IFRS, local regulations)

faqs.question: What standards do you follow for property valuations?
faqs.answer:
We apply a scientific methodology that includes:
- Analysis of local market trends and recent transactions
- Property condition, location, and amenities
- Approved valuation standards (income approach, cost approach, market comparison)
- Compliance with official regulations (banks, municipalities)
To ensure accurate and reliable results.

faqs.question: How is service pricing calculated?
faqs.answer:
Service fees are calculated based on:
- Service type
- Working days required
- Other relevant factors

faqs.question: Can I track my request status during the valuation process?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can track your request status through our mobile application.
